resources.string: Please read our terms and conditions carefully. By using this application, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use this application.

We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information. By using this application, you consent to the practices described in this policy.
Please accept the terms and conditions to proceed.
I accept the terms and conditions

Note: The GramPlayer app does not facilitate downloading, converting, or streaming content from unauthorised third-party sources such as YouTube, Instagram, or similar services. Instead, it is designed to work exclusively with the user’s personal Telegram account using Telegram’s official TDLib API. The app allows only the authenticated Telegram user to log in with their own account. No external or unauthorised third-party content sources are used.The app follows Telegram’s official API/TDLib usage guidelines. This app functions as a personal Telegram media manager for the signed-in user and does not provide or promote unauthorised downloads from any third-party platforms. Reference : https://core.telegram.org/tdlib and https://core.telegram.org/api
